mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Senator John Davison (Jay) Rockefeller IV Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Senator Rockefeller, his wife Sharon, and author Christopher G. Janus holding a book in the Senator's office
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Senate Photographic Studio
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller, his wife Sharon, and author Christopher G. Janus, a West Virginia native, hold a copy of the author's novel, "Miss 4th of July, Goodbye". The novel is set in Montgomery, West Virginia and is based on the real-life experiences that Janus's sister had when she immigrated from Greece to West Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rockefeller, John D, IV (John Davison), 1937
Rockefeller, Sharon Percy, 1944
digital images
mdRecord.dcterms:source: Senator John D. (Jay) Rockefeller IV papers, West Virginia & Regional History Center, West Virginia University Libraries
